attributes.action: Re-Nationalise the Fuelcompanies so that they can cross-subsidise giving us the British Public Cheaper Fuel bills
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With companies like British Gas anouncing Vast profits yet still putting up their energy prices because they can not cross-subsidise their business... a renationalisation would mean that any profits could offset the rising cost of fuel
